Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan come into the tournament with a 2-0 defeat to England in the bilateral series.
The batting has work to do if Pakistan are to challenge for the coveted T20 World Cup trophy.
Pakistan have several shortcomings in that middle order.
USA are the team to watch out for. They stunned Bangladesh 2-1 at home and were off to a solid start versus Canada.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average first-innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 148 runs.
The surface at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas is pretty balanced. Pacers will get movement early on.
As far as the weather is concerned, the temperature will hover around 35 degrees Celsius. Meanwhile, the humidity is expected to be around 50%.
The match will start at 9:00pm IST on June 6, 2024. Fans can watch the match live on the Star Sports Network and stream the same on the Disney+Hotstar app for free.
